lines.text: Someone casting <c=#FF0000>Emergency Exit</c> would be... ''Fleeing'', maybe? ''Teleporting''?
That could count as a <c=#FF00FF>status effect</c> that could make <c=#0000FF>Flesh to Stone</c> backfire...
Or... no, that's probably not it. And... it doesn't look like the <c=#FF00FF>intended victim</c> could cast <c=#FF0000>Emergency Exit</c>, anyway.
Unless he were actually aiming at the other wizard? But... that's kind of a long shot.
